metadata.title: CVE-2020-2926 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Group Replication GCS). Supported versions that are affected are8.0.19 and prior. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privilegedattacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQLServer. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorizedability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) ofMySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.4 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
